overview: A middle-aged man works as a janitor at a public health center and has an abnormally high libido. His wife is exhausted by the number of times he asks for sex, and begins to repeatedly refuse his advances. The troubled man steals chloroform from the public health center where he works, and makes his wife sniff it. The man throws all of his desires into his wife, who lies down like a doll, and he ends up shaving her pubic hair. Upon regaining consciousness, she rejects everything about her husband from that day on, much to his chagrin. The man that has too much libido will eventually use the chloroform to attack women he doesn't even know, one after another...
title: Ijô seiyoku-ma
